u.a: when camera begins , CHI is at his appropriate spot at "table" which is car , and indicates to ADA who is also kneeling beside car where her place setting is , and ADA moves over to sit where ADA should . CHI giggles and plays eating so as to inform ADA exactly what they are playing , with eyes always on ADA .
ADA follows suit and starts eating , then goes over to oven . CHI jumps up and moves to oven in answer to this .
shows her where the coffee is , but ADA moves away toward sofa .
CHI serves her some coffee at her place at the table and puts coffee back on oven
excitedly adds this as CHI sits back down at table .
CHI indicates to her where her food is by pointing
CHI indicates to her where her food is by pointing
CHI turns steering wheel and informs ADA that the car is his . ADA helps him steer wheel , both smile .
CHI sings inaudibly and smiles and eats .
ADA suddenly gets up and walks over toward oven and asks this .
CHI points to sofa
ADA touches snake with foot and asks this .
CHI corrects her this after looking at what ADA is talking about and leaves "table" .
ADA asks this , crawling along floor .
CHI points to sofa with snake's head in hand .
ADA asks for repetition .
ADA gets repetition , with a helpful pointing finger .
after discovering where the baby is , ADA drops the subject and looks into suitcase and mumbles to herself , with back to CHI .
CHI drops snake and comes over to investigate suitcase , too , and takes something out of the suitcase and holds it up .
ADA mumbles . it is not clear what ADA is referring to as she has her back to the camera .
CHI corrects her strongly
ADA mutters almost inaudibly with back still to CHI .
CHI proclaims this .
CHI this as if a baby is needed to complete the household and CHI is angry that ADA has not supplied the baby .
ADA turns to CHI and gets up and reaches for baby on sofa , but picks up tool bolt instead .

CHI quickly moves over to pick up box that ADA had just had in her hand and accidently kneels into , oven , sending all pots and pans crashing and knocking over oven entirely and adorably apologizes .
ADA does not react to his apology , only to kneel down and pick up after him . CHI meanwhile is sitting beside sofa putting different objects into small box with back to ADA , quietly to self .

ADA comes over to see what CHI is doing and CHI says this in slightly louder voice now that CHI has an audience , but ADA turns away and CHI takes his toys over to ironing board and stares at poster on wall . ADA crawls along floor and then walks toword cradle .
CHI asks this with direct gaze , holding up plastic screwdriver . ADA nods her head yes
CHI accepts her possession .
uses it to fix steering wheel .

ADA comes over to see more closely what CHI is repairing , with direct gaze to ADA . CHI sticks screwdriver securely in steering wheel and turns wheel and giggles , obviously pleased with how CHI has made the screwdriver go around with steering wheel .
ADA looks away and then looks back and asks CHI why he rubbcd screwdriver so vigorously .
CHI abandons car and answers .
and moves to sofa and puts screwdriver down .
picks up pliers .
and fixes car with them . ADA watches intently and turns away once and turns back as CHI has moved off camera , and ADA turns wheel noise .
CHI rushes over and takes over wheel .
CHI begins "fixing" car again .
emphasis on "I" , trying also to be helpful . ADA sits down on floor and moves truck along , making car noises with back to CHI .
CHI moves back over to sofa and arranges tools on tool belt , speaks to self with back to ADA .
ADA comes over to sofa and offers him the little plastic rake .
CHI turns to her and requests confirmation .
corrects her for calling him "daddy" , with direct gaze .
CHI moves to car andpoints to different plates and saucer , on table in loud voice .
ADA watches for a moment and goes back to arranging toys cn sofa . CHI wanders around combing his hair with the rake , as ADA turns to watch .
CHI stoops and picks up necklace and asks ADA .
before he can repeat the whole question , putting necklace on head , ADA answers quietly .
CHI breaks beads and they begin falling to floor and CHI begins laughing to cover up his guilt .
ADA watches attentively as CHI pulls all the beads off the string and proclaims .
CHI kneels down to look inside suitcase .
ADA quietly answers , as ADA turns away , obviously not very interested .
CHI excitedly proclaims this and gets ada's attention , who then turns to tool belt .
CHI walks toward car and absently .
fiddles with key and car , asking this .
CHI hesitates in his answer .
asks this , obviously not wanting her to play with his car .
ADA interrupts him by naming the keys "she just picked up off the sofa ,
CHI requests information , and ADA nods agreement .
CHI adds this and walks to ADA .
trying to satisfy her .
ADA walks toward car with keys in hand land fiddles with steering wheel .
CHI is busy fiddling with something on the sofa which is off camera .
CHI is busy fiddling with something on the sofa . is off camera
is pleased with his accomplishment . ADA ignores him and retrieves something from sofa and returns to car .
CHI says this to no one in particular , gazing at tool in his hand .
CHI moves to fix car , in commanding voice .
ADA coyly asks this .
but gets no reply , only a quiet command .
but gets no reply , only a quiet command .
ADA attends and reaches for utensil ADA believes CHI is talking about and he grabs it out of her hand .
when ADA begins turning the wheel , CHI proclaims in loud voice , holding wheel and "repairing" it with tool .
ADA , knowing she is of no help , walks away saying this .
CHI speaks to himself , busy fixing car while ADA makes trip around car .
CHI speaks to himself , busy fixing car while ADA makes trip around car .
ADA then sits down at place setting and begins to eat and places some "food" on roy's plate .
CHI stops what CHI is doing for a minute as if to think and then proudly rejects father role .
ADA complies with his rejection submissively .
pointing to center of steering wheel , ADA looks up but then walks away
CHI continues as if talking to himself .
turns to see ADA looking at him from behind .
asks .
when CHI gets no reply , or slight head shake , CHI takes that as a negative answer and then requests confirmation . he turns back to his car as ADA glances at posters on wall .
CHI runs over to where fire engine lies on floor and kneels down and says excitedly . ADA follows and observes .
CHI running over to where fire engine lies on floor and kneels down and says excitedly . ADA follows and observes .
ADA moves off camera , presumably toward car and asks about tool .
then continues on subject , not sure of what ADA is talking about .
then continues on subject , not sure of what ADA is talking about .
CHI ignores her until ADA calls him Daddy and he jumps up and takes over again and this loudly , pushing her aside .
ADA walks away sniffling , looking at floor , correcting herself once ADA said dad .
rhetorically asks this .
gets correct response .
ADA absently rambles on here as CHI half hearted for whatever ADA is missing .
ADA absently rambles on here as CHI halfhearted for whatever ADA is missing .
ADA absently rambles on here as CHI halfhearted for whatever ADA is missing .

but ADA quickly corrects .

gets it confirmation , as ADA walks toward door .
CHI almost shouts .
begins fixing car again .
shoving all plates and cups off car .
authoritatively asserts this as ADA quietly observes .
authoritatively asserts this as ADA quietly observes .

CHI answers but does not listen to furthcr comments as CHI is busy turning on car .

ADA says to self , with sigh , and CHI continues on car
asks of ADA , without direct gaze .
asks of ADA , without direct gaze .

ADA wandering around room aimlesslly and then walking over to poster on wall and staring at it . there is simultaneously singing .

all the while singing and begins turning wheel on car , watching ADA stare at poster , then CHI looks in cradle and then picks up comb off floor and holds it up and gets ada's attention . continued singing .
ADA comes over to inspect comb more closely as CHI places it on the car for both to see better .

CHI watches as ADA puts bracelet on arm and comments about appropriate place for bracelets .
CHI and gets appropriate response , and nod of head .
CHI pretends to brush ada's hair with comb as if instructions were written on comb that "said" it was for brushing .
then begins brushing his own hair .
then begins brushing his own hair .
drops comb and rubs head .
drops comb and rubs head .
CHI moves away while ADA , still kneeling beside car , picks up comb and begins combing her own hair . ADA quietly mumbles .
but ADA is ignored as CHI continues his sentence . ADA gets up and moves over to CHI , who is standing at sofa with back to her and says this , a little more loudly .
gets appropriate response , without direct gaze . ADA shows him her "comb" and asks , CHI hesitates to answer , not sure of what he wants to say
he finally gets out "that's a brush" as loud proclamation
he finally gets out "that's a brush" as loud proclamation
CHI tries to get something out of the tool belt becoming frustrated and raising his voice at every struggle .
ADA watches patiently and quietly conjectures
CHI continues struggling with belt and asks ADA if she can see what he is after .
CHI continues struggling with belt and asks ADA if she can see what he is after .
the baby bottle drops out of the belt and CHI examines it .

CHI answers .
glances around floor and says this seeming rather bored .

ADA reaches into wheel to obey .
but requests confirmation .
and gets it but ADA loses interest .
